snippet.title: RiftStar Raiders Announcement Trailer - Vision Games
snippet.description:
Enlist your most reliable teammates to shoot and loot your way through 9 formidable four player co-op missions, wiping out swarms of aliens, feds and rival pirate gangs in this deep space, top down, shoot ‘em up. Collect perks and loot as you clash with mobs of enemies in intense combat and reap the rewards to craft and upgrade your ship. 

Customise your spacecraft with tons of combinations to create your perfect loadout, whether you want to be a tank to take the hits, a support to snatch your comrades from the jaws of death, an agile damage dealer and more.

Developed by Climax Studios and published by Vision Games.

Twitter: www.twitter.com/riftstarraiders
Facebook: www.facebook.com/riftstarraiders
Instagram: www.instagram.com/riftstarraiders
